Package com.tabuto.jsimlife.views

Class Summary
JSLAboutView Show a simple frame in order to display a logo and an HTML textPane contains some JSimLife information such as: Version
Copyright info
License
Web site

JSLChartsView Simple frame show a combo box allows users chooses a single chart to view.
JSLControlPanelView Simple class extends J2DControlPanel and display a simple JTable contains some statistical data.
JSLDnaTreePanelView Show a panel with a wrapped JTree able to display an XML documents such as a Dna
JSLMainView Class that creates the main window in which appears all the Game components: JSLMenu: a menu bar;
JSLToolbar: a toolbar;
JSLSimulationView: the canvas panel where Zlifes lives;
JSLControlPanelView: the panel where some statistical information are displayed;
JSLStatusBar: the panel displayed some game informations;
This class uses the Configuration class in order to store some game parameters such as the canvas panel size, the background color of canvas panel, etc...
JSLMenu This class extends JMenuBar to add into JSLMainView a simple men√π bar.
JSLNewCellView Class display the Frame contains all the parameters to create a new Zlife's type.
JSLPreferencesView Show a simple JFrame allows users change the game's configuration parameters
JSLSelectedZlifeView Show a JFrame contains several information about selected ZLife.
JSLSimulationView Class that extends J2DCanvasPanel in order to display the game sprites.
JSLStatusBar Simple Class extends J2DBottomPanel uses to display several game information: Actual Cell Number and Actual Game Status: PLAY or PAUSE.
JSLToolbar Simple Class extends JToolBar uses to show several JSimLife button that performs JSimLife's Actions
Launcher
